author: Geodude77
title: Sssssnakes vs ssninja!!!!
review:
This set came on the front of a magazine.

Minifigure 1-Jay

This minifigure has the legacy hood ,which is blue with a darker blue strip. The head is double sided,one side is an angry face and the other, is a laughing face.Both sides have freckles.Moving on to the torso,it has a simple legacy dragon pattern. The arms are plain blue with black hands. The legs are blue with printed features on. The weapon is nunchucks with a grey chain and black handles.

Minifigure 2-Lasha

 Lasha is a recognised Venomari tribe snake.He has a regular hair piece found on all of the other Lasha minifigures. His head is not double sided.You can see his scary face of four eyes. His printed torso has very good details. The arms are green with black hands. His legs are green with a simple scale design. His weapon is a tooth-like sword.

Overall, it is a good magazine gift.As I have been looking for a Jay for a long time,I am happy with this set. If you want to make a serpentine army,and a ninja team, this is a good set to go for!
